caption:
This photograph captures a scene inside a church during a sermon or speech. The main focus is a man standing at a pulpit, reading or speaking. He appears to be a clergy member, wearing glasses and a green and white clerical stole over a black robe. The pulpit is made of wood and has a microphone attached, suggesting a formal address to an audience.

The background features architectural elements typical of a church, including high walls with a series of arched windows that let in natural light. Above the windows, there are statues of three figures, possibly saints, standing in a row, all of them wearing robes and with their hands either folded in prayer or extended outward.

In the foreground, slightly blurred, there appears to be a floral arrangement or decorations that add a touch of color, predominantly red, to the scene. This hints at a special occasion or celebrates the church service. Subdued indoor lighting, augmented by the sunlight coming through the windows, creates a solemn and respectful atmosphere typical of religious gatherings.
title: Religion plays an important part in the lives of residents.  The largest group of churchgoers are roman catholics.  A priest at the New Ulm cathedral is shown during a folk guitar mass.  This weekly event was begun for the younger people and has become the most popular mass with standing room only.  The church interior is decorated with baroque carvings reminiscent of churches in southern germany's bavarian
